name: 5th International Conference on Geotechnical Research and Engineering (ICGRE’20)
content: The Conference Proceedings will be published with an ISSN and ISBN, indexed in Scopus and Google Scholar, and archived permanently in Portico. The 5th International Conference on Geotechnical Research and Engineering (ICGRE'20) aims to become the leading annual conference in fields related to Geotechnical Engineering. Topics for ICGRE’20 include, but are not limited, to the following: Dams and Tunnelling Engineering Geology Geoenvironmental related topics Geohazards and Risk Assessment Geotechnical Infrastructure Geosynthetics and Geoproducts Marine Geotechnics Mining and Geotechnics Design and Modelling Soil and Rock Mechanics and Characterization Transportation Geotechnics, Engineering and Technology
